cryptocurrency.description: High-volume transactions, real-time processing, and global infrastructure

video_streaming.description: High-bandwidth video content delivery requires significant data center resources and CDN infrastructure

social_media.description: Complex algorithms, real-time feeds, and massive user bases require extensive computational resources

search_engine.description: Massive index maintenance, real-time query processing, and global infrastructure

cloud_storage.description: Data redundancy, synchronization, and global accessibility require distributed storage systems

messaging.description: Relatively efficient text-based communication with minimal computational overhead

e_commerce.description: Product catalogs, recommendation engines, and transaction processing require moderate resources

ai_assistant.description: AI model inference requires significant computational power but lower total usage than mass platforms

news_media.description: Content delivery with moderate multimedia requirements and CDN usage

gaming.description: Real-time multiplayer processing, graphics rendering, and low-latency requirements

productivity.description: Document processing and collaboration tools with moderate computational needs

music_streaming.description: Audio streaming requires less bandwidth than video but still significant due to scale

educational.description: Content delivery and interactive learning tools with moderate resource requirements

travel.description: Real-time pricing, availability checking, and booking systems require constant data processing

navigation.description: Real-time traffic data, route calculation, and location services require continuous processing

email.description: Email storage and delivery with minimal real-time processing requirements

developer_tools.description: Code compilation, CI/CD pipelines, and development environments require substantial processing power
